column3: Main GUPRI (i.e. PID) under which all terms are defined. Preference is to use PURLs or W3IDs as they provide permanent resolvable identifiers.

column1: Prefixes for controlled vocabularies, schema and ontologies

column5: Prefix for our controlled vocabulary since it is rather tedious to write long URLs all the time
Prefix for SKOS Onotlogy is which our base for defining SKOS based controlled vocabulary
Prefix for the ontology language of the Semantic Web, which empowers fast and flexible data modeling and efficient automated reasoning
Prefix for Provenance, Authoring and Versioning Onotlogy which properties such as version and createdOn we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary
Prefix for Dublin Core (Terms) Ontology which properties such as title, description, rights, source, etc. we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary as well to define its terms
Prefix for Metadata Ontology Vocabulary which is a standard for ontology metadata
Prefix for the Description of a Project Ontology which describes software projects, in particular free and open source software
Prefix for the I-ADOPT Ontology which describes observable properties

Prefix for a simple ontology which implements the Parameter Usage 
Vocabulary semantic model, as described at 
https://github.com/nvs-vocabs/P01.
Prefix for the Semantic Sensor Network Ontology
Prefix for the Ontology for eXtenisble Markup Language schemas
Prefix for the Research Description Framework that provides the data model explaining how to build a graph
Prefix for the Research Description Framework Schema that explains how nodes in a graph relate
Prefix for "Quantity, Unit, Dimension and Type" schema that is used to model physical units.
Prefix for QUDT Vocabulary of Units which terms we will use to semantically define units of measurements for terms (i.e., variables) we are defining

column3: Home page of community creating vocabulary

column2: Project Descriptor of LDbase Project page

column3: ORCID of the creator of the vocabulary, can be multiple (use separate lines)
vocabularies to which terms of this vocabulary are aligned with

column2: descriptors that apply to the project methodologies

column3: ROR or name of the responsible party for the publication of the vocabulary
Vocabulary repository where this vocabulary is uploaded
Vocabulary repository where this vocabulary is uploaded
Language of metadata and vocabulary terms
Vocabulary used to describe the metadata of the vocabulary
License under which the vocabulary is provided
Date when vocabulary was initially created
Automatic update when vocabulary is updated
